data.name: Star Commander - The Sentinel
data.detailed_description:
On a far out secret space station a lab patient awakens, with no memory of his past or who he is . He is suddenly faced with immediate danger, as the space station is under attack.

Our hero must escape before the station succumbs to the enemy attack and start on a journey to discover who he is are and why he came to be in that laboratory.

Star Commander - The Sentinel, is a point and click adventure game inspired by the adventure game classics of the mid 1990s

Key Features:

  • Over 75 different areas to explore
  • An immersive sci-fi story.
  • Packed full of puzzles with multiple solutions.
  • Optional puzzles - learn more about the galaxy at your own pace.
  • Meet an assortment of humans and aliens from all over the galaxy!

data.short_description: Solve the mystery of your hidden past as you traverse the galaxy in this epic Sci-Fi point and click adventure.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or above
  • Processor: Pentium or higher processor
  • Memory: 64 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Supports all DirectX-compatible sound and video cards
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 700 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Supports all DirectX-compatible sound and video cards
